version_name: 3.8.1:- Bug fixes and minor improvementsVersion 3.8:- BODY KITS: install aftermarket bumpers

version_description:
- BODY KITS: install aftermarket bumpers, skirts and spoilers to give your car a whole new look. Now available for class D, C, and select class B cars, with more coming soon.
- CHRISTMAS SPECIAL: Race the mysterious stranger and win great prizes!
- JDM PACK: five cult classics from the Japanese tuner scene of the early 2000-s:
1997 Mazda RX-7 Type RS
1997 Toyota Supra Twin Turbo
1999 Nissan Silvia Spec-R 
2002 Subaru Impreza WRX STi
2004 Honda S2000

Version 3.8.1:
- Bug fixes and minor improvements

Version 3.8:
- BODY KITS: install aftermarket bumpers, skirts and spoilers to give your car a whole new look. Now available for class D, C, and select class B cars, with more coming soon.
- CHRISTMAS SPECIAL: Race the mysterious stranger and win great prizes!
- JDM PACK: five cult classics from the Japanese tuner scene of the early 2000-s:
1997 Mazda RX-7 Type RS
1997 Toyota Supra Twin Turbo
1999 Nissan Silvia Spec-R 
2002 Subaru Impreza WRX STi
2004 Honda S2000

v. 3.9.3
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
v. 3.9
- MODERN MUSCLE PACK
'11 Cadillac CTS-V Coupé
and 4 more cars coming soon

- NEW "CAR INTRO" & "WEEKLY" EVENTS
Entry restricted by model, make, horsepower or class
Wildcard Upgrades

- NEW AFTERMARKET RIMS & WHEELS
20+ designs with various sizes & colors

- NEW BODY KITS
45 new designs for select class C, B & B1 cars

- MISC
Test Drive Option
Power Saving mode
Fixed bug preventing mechanic from producing max stat blueprints
Fixed suspension glitch
Numerous bug fixes and improvements

- Issues related to Live Multiplayer fixed
- Minor bug fixes
- Visual improvements
- Advanced Options for managing graphic post effects
Fixed various issues related to real-time multiplayer, including dropped connections, verification errors, handling of blown engines and opponents quitting the race. Fewer bugs, more fun!

Hey NNO Racers, 

We’ve got awesome news for you:
- Brand new Menu Design and result screen
- New ‘Salt Lake’ race track
- Live broadcasting feature!
- Toyo Tires added as new Events sponsor and Tires Blueprints
- Weekly Events now divided into Regional and International Leagues
- New cars: BMW M4 GTS, Megane RS, Renault Clio, VW Scirocco and more!
- Driver Crew member redesigned and now helps you to win Prize Boxes using your car.
- New Prize boxes and customization coupons for your car.
- New Body Kits for B/A/A1 cars
- Gold Card subscription to receive gold every day!
- Cat decals ^_^
- A lot of bugfixes that make game even better

See you at the track!

Hey NNO Racers,
Critical bugs fixed and stability improved!

Hey NNO Racers, 

We've fixed a lot of bugs including:
• iPhone 5 menu freeze fixed
• Team chat fixed
• Customization issues fixed
• Overall stability increased

See you on track!

HoHoHo! The Holiday Season brings new things:
- New cars coming soon: 2017 Ford GT and four new Supercars from McLaren! 
- New Holiday event with Santa
- Mystery Racer racing in live multiplayer with awesome rewards
- Snow covered tracks and menus
- New custom build cars from design contest winners
- New Holiday decals
- Various bugfixes and all-around improvements
See you on the track!

HoHoHo! The Holiday Season brings new things:
- New cars coming soon: 2017 Ford GT and four new Supercars from McLaren! 
- New Holiday event with Santa
- Mystery Racer racing in live multiplayer with awesome rewards
- Snow covered tracks and menus
- New custom build cars from design contest winners
- New Holiday decals
- Various bugfixes and all-around improvements
See you on the track!

Valentine's Day update! You will LOVE IT! 
- Ford GT 2017 & Ford GT Heritage Edition are ready to drive
- LOVE'n'ROLL RACE
Race your heart out against Stupid Cupid and the Love Machine to win a special gift
- SUPER VALENTINE DECALS PACK!
Add the look of love to your ride with Valentine's decals
- STUPID CUPID RACER
Appears in the Live Multiplayer, get a special prize if you're lucky enough to beat him 
- More Design & Shine Contest builds available in the Car Dealer
- Fixed annoying issues with Real Time Multiplayer

INTRODUCING NEW CARS:
Jaguar F-Type SVR, Jaguar XJ220, Jaguar C-X75 and the 2017 Mazda MX-5 Miata RF

THE WINNER GETS IT ALL
Now you can place bets in Real-Time Multiplayer races. Winner takes the pot. 

IMPROVED LOOK AND FEEL
• Updated Career Lobby
• New Improved HUD

MORE AWESOME STUFF
• Car Dealer now offers the stock paint of your choice for free
• New RH Alurad and TEC Speedwheels Rims
• Bugfixes and various improvements

• Introducing new cars from McLaren at the dealership!
• Meet the cult classic: Jaguar E-Type Series 1
• Negative reaction time issue and 30+ other bugs fixed.

• Introducing new cars from McLaren at the dealership!
• Meet the cult classic: Jaguar E-Type Series 1
• Negative reaction time issue and 30+ other bugs fixed.

• Introducing Live Race Leagues! 
Climb the leaderboard across numerous league divisions, including a Top division limited to the 10 most elite racers.  Leagues will renew weekly, prizes will be awarded according to league ranking.
• New car class with carton-conversion tanks to drive!
• Special US decals are now available for US racers!
• We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes.

• Race with Scott Eastwood and Ana de Armas in the Overdrive movie car series event!
• Introducing Live Race Leagues! 
Climb the leaderboard across numerous league divisions, including a Top division limited to the 10 most elite racers. 
Leagues will renew weekly, prizes will be awarded according to league ranking.
• New car class with carton-conversion tanks to drive!
• We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes.

ARKit - to take your favorite car beyond the screen and freeing it to interact with the real world in entirely new ways!

• Koenigsegg masterpieces - ONE:1 and Regera
• Liberty Walk presents LB Challenger for you to win with style
• ABT – please welcome new chip tuned Audi S5 Coupe 2013, Audi RS7 2013 and Audi RS3 2011
• Heart-Racing Heritage - new Honda Civic Type R

New VIP system to thank our most dedicated players with various luxury bonuses and rewards.
New body kits for Honda Civic Type R to give it a really cool look!

Hey NNO Racers, 
We’ve got extremely good news for you:
- Coming to Car Dealer soon heartbreaking Acura NSX GT3
- Black Friday sale event!
- Real-time multiplayer fixes
- We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes.

Christmas special Race Events are already here!
- New Holiday events with special gift from Santa!
- Mystery Snow Beauty racer is back in the Real-time multiplayer!
- Add some holiday atmosphere to your car with a Special Christmas decals pack!

New iconic and innovative cars coming to the Car Dealer:
- West Coast Customs proudly presents Chrysler 300 and Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG!
- Foose Design introduces Challenger 71, Terracuda and legendary Camaro 1969!
- Our special offer for all concept cars lovers - an unique and powerful ‘F' Class Matikainen AD car!

Also we have some news for you:
- Absolutely new Racer’s Profile screen
- Brand New Career Offers to get Rare Cars easier and make your race great again and again
- More VIP bonuses for our dedicated players
- We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes

Racer! Get the full-of-new-cars update now!

The super sports car KTM X-Bow GT4 is making an appearance in Nitro Nation!

For all our dedicated speed fanatics there are more cars to come from brands such as Audi, Ford Mustang, and Nissan!

We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes.                                                                                                                                                                          

See you at the finish line!

Passionate Racers, this update is just for you!
Enjoy the variety of new events and challenges:

• Get ready for the Lunar New Year celebration, full of crazy deals and speedy rides!
• Valentine’s Day special will charm you in no time with the Lovemobile available at the car dealer!
• Stupid Cupid is back on the track, find this brat, beat him up and claim your prize!
• Festive offers and deals you just can’t resist!

Tournaments and races for every taste:

• New Season is starting - compete with your rivals on the track and prove you are the fastest!
• Praise the all-time most wanted vehicle Mazda MX5 with its 30 anniversary and exclusive event with real prizes powered by Mazda!

We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes.

Shamrock special 5.9 Update is here!
- Pot of Gold Race, special gifts, and lots of surprises!
- Have you seen our sneaky Leprechaun? Catch him and beat him up - you will get a special prize!
- St. Patricks Car Series awaits you!
- Since we can't buy you a pint of Guinness, we'll increase the Blueprint drop!

We listened carefully and here they are: 
- Corvette ZR1 Coupe 2019
- Porsche 918 Spyder
- Porsche 718 Cayman GTS

- Nissan Skyline GTR R34 Nismo
- Subaru BRZ from Tofu Garage
- Mercedes-Benz comes with mighty C63 AMG

Ready for the most epic update? Get this:
- Complete graphics update - cutting edge lighting and post-processing across the entire product
- All-new locations: Amsterdam, Drag Strip, Salt Lake
- Completely redesigned race cameras with cinematic mode
- Day/night and weather conditions that affect the cars' physics
- New real-time multiplayer mode for 10 simultaneous racers
- New customization option: neon underlights
- Two most community-requested cars: 2018 Dodge Demon and Mitsubishi Evo GSR Final Edition
- New tuning UI designed for the elite players

Ready for the most epic update? Get this:
- Complete graphics update - cutting edge lighting and post-processing across the entire product
- All-new locations: Amsterdam, Drag Strip, Salt Lake
- Completely redesigned race cameras with cinematic mode
- Day/night and weather conditions that affect the cars' physics

- New customization option: neon underlights

- New tuning UI designed for the elite players

New cars coming soon to NITRO NATION:
• A British pioneer who doesn't play by the rule book will make his first appearance in Nitro Nation! Lotus 70th Anniversary introduced with 4 new vehicles! 
• You asked for it - we deliver! With the Dodge SRT Durango the very first SUV will join NITRO NATION!
• Another beast to accompany the Demon on the track - the brand new Camaro ZL1 1LE!
New features:
• Introducing League Seasons – a monthly series of events to determine the best racer who will get Fame and awesome real-life Prizes!
• Random Rumble mode goes Battle Royale: real-time multiplayer for 100 frantic racers!
• Build the fastest Team and get it to the top of real-time multiplayer Team Ratings!
• New Car Selection panel for easy and smooth navigation.
• Full widescreen support.
• Please meet KTPlay - instant in-app community hub!
• Customizable and adjustable drag rims on many cars!
• Double value IAPs and new special offers for new racers!

We have made the game even better with various improvements and fixes!

All good racers will get a gift from Santa! Be ready for Christmas special Race Events:
• New Holiday tournaments with real prizes powered by car brands!

Enjoy your ride!

It’s Nitro Nation 5th anniversary, Racers!

The all-time wanted cars are now added to the Car Dealer:

• Rapid Mitsubishi Evo 7 2002
• And dynamic BMW M8 GTE 2018

Celebrate the 5th anniversary with special events and tournaments!
New Season has started: challenge your rivals on the track and take away the whole piece!
Get ready to the Easter bunny hunt and test your skills in Egg Roll Race Series!
More unique decals to create your dream car design!

Racer! In this update you can win a real trip to the KTM Headquarters in Austria!

The super sports car KTM X-Bow GT4 is making an appearance in Nitro Nation!
Join the special KTM X-BOW tournament, complete it and get a chance to win a trip to Austria along with the Nitro Nation Team!

For all our dedicated speed fanatics there are more cars to come from brands such as Audi, Ford Mustang, and Nissan!

We have made the game even better with various improvements and fixes!
See you on the track!

Meet the real game changer - DRIFT in Nitro Nation!

KEEP IT SIDEWAYS
- Drift Seasons and live races are open!
- Steer to victory using adjustable tilt, touch, or analog controls

NEW TRACKS
- Perfect your lines on the Ring or drift your way at the Docks

SUSPENSION UPGRADES
- Turn your favourite car into a lowrider or give it a show-stopping stance
- Fine-tune springs and dampers to optimize control or traction

WAIT, THERE'S MORE
- Epic 4th of July celebration!
- Stunning rides from Nissan, BMW, Audi, and Volkswagen
- New Car Dealer filters for easier sorting
- New decals to update your designs
- Improved graphics, effects, music, and sounds

Drag or drift, muscle or JDM - get the update and race your way!

Racer!
The fall season has kicked off with savage races, all-new cars and insane rewards! 

Introducing luxury Maserati with 2 brilliant models!
Plus 4 more cars including the iconic DeLorean!

New Season - New Rules:
Tournaments rebalanced with a cap on attempts!
Sleeker reminders and drift bonus notifications!

Fully reimagined store for a more attractive user experience!
All the juicy offers are now in one place!
Easy to access Subscription tab!

Get the update and step on the gas!

Booo!
Halloween is creeping up again! Celebrate with these special events and updates.

Dressing up for Halloween? Get into the spirit with 3 cars featuring spooky skins inspired by classic horror films. Available for a limited time only!
While you’re at the Dealer's, check out our newest models: Mini John Cooper Works Concept, Maserati GranTurismo 2018, BMW Z4 sDrive30i, and the brand-new Maserati Levante GTS!
And that’s not all! Look out - spine-chilling surprises are waiting for you!

Don’t let cobwebs grow on your tires – get behind the wheel right now!

Police sirens still echo in the distance, but it’s already time to GEAR UP FOR BLACK FRIDAY!

After a quick warm-up, expect a WEEK OF MINDBLOWING SALES AND OFFERS that only come around ONCE A YEAR!

ALL CARS usually only available in crates will be UNLOCKED, along with other opportunities to become THE BEST OF THE BEST!

Don’t miss out! Check the store daily for NEW OFFERS AND DEALS!

And, of course, new cars:
- VW Golf A7 GTI TCR 2017
- Renault Sport R.S. 01 2015 

Enjoy the updated, more user-friendly store design and look out for in-game news!

Ready? HIT THE GAS!

Ready? HIT THE GAS!

Jingle Bells, Jingle Wheels!
Happy holidays to all racers!
May the hottest rides, the sleekest styles, major wins and record times, and maximum achievements all be yours!

Log in to celebrate and enjoy pleasant surprises: new models including Nissan 2020 Vision Gran Turismo 2014, minor diversions, special versions of cars and series for them!
And a special gift for fans of controlled slips and slides — a new winter track for drift! It’s truly slide-tastic!

Speed into the new year!

2020 brings more surprises so let’s keep the celebration going!

Pick up a car with an awesome themed skin and race in a special series for Chinese New Year! 
Elite crates will light up the holiday with a higher chance of getting the new car!
Special events for those in love with the fast lane will kick off on Valentine’s Day!
And, of course, we’ve added new cars: Audi, Renault, Maserati, and the legendary McLaren Senna! 


3-2-1 GO!

Spring Special Update is here!

Pot of Gold Race, special gifts, and lots of surprises!
Have you seen our sneaky Leprechaun? Catch him and beat him up - you will get a special prize!
St. Patricks Car Series awaits you!

We listened carefully and here they are:

Maserati Alfieri Concept
Dodge Coronet Super Bee 1970
Dodge Super Charger 2018
Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR 2018
Jaguar XE SV Project 8 
Dodge Charger Daytona 1970
AMC Rebel Machine 1970

Sláinte!

A fresh batch of breathtaking updates!
A whole new run of events:
- Don’t miss the launch of the McLaren Senna, the fastest car in the game!
- Celebrate Memorial Day and Father’s Day at breakneck speeds!

Hey Racer!
There's no better way to celebrate America's Birthday than by racing in the new update!
INDEPENDENCE DAY CELEBRATION: meet the new custom car and thrilling events!
UNIQUE SUBARU CARS: brought to you by the winners of the design competition.
DRIFT HOLIDAYS: cruise in Nissan R32 GT-R with a one of a kind skin.
SPECIAL ANNIVERSARY EVENTS: celebration on the high speed provided by Audi, Subaru, Koenigsegg, Bugatti, Cadillac, and Mercedes-Benz.
Hit the gas and let the party begin!

Improved notification system so that you don't miss any racing fun!

Hey, Racers! The new update is definitely worth checking, see for yourself:

- Introducing new TofuGarage cars, featuring Nissan Silvia S13 and Mazda RX7
- Keep it sideways at the Drift Holidays 2020, an epic 2 weeks of non-stop rubber burning event
- Back to School season offers you last hot summer deals and races
- Oktoberfest is still on in Nitro Nation! Have fun racing and stay safe
- Celebrate birthdays of Lotus, DeLorean, Renault, Jaguar, and Mini

Start Racing NOW!

Hey, Racers!
We have made the best even better with various bug-fixes
Start Racing NOW!

Hey, Racers!  Time to shift gears, new stuff has arrived:
- Halloween in Nitro Nation brings risky races, spooky contests, and a brand-new car opening! Buckle up!
- November is full of birthdays, so prepare to celebrate Dodge, Honda, Maserati, & McLaren!
- Black Friday will please you with crazy discounts and mind-blowing offers!
- And don't miss new cars from brands like RUF, Saleen, Chevrolet, Liberty Walk, and Ford!
Phew, that's quite a list! Prepare, beware, and we'll see you on the track!
